author: Aman Sharma
title: How India will run the fund to fight a virus
description: How India will run the fund to fight a virusThe board of trustees includes the defence minister, home minister and finance minister in ex-officio capacity.
content: NEW DELHI: The PM-CARES Fund can have up to 13 eminent experts, working pro bono, and can undertake relief or assistance of any kind relating to a public health emergency or any other emergency, including the creation and upgradation of healthcare facilities,… [+2122 chars]
